Hello, I'm

Coding Apps since 2011. I love to code and teach others. "Postmann" is my most recent Chrome Extension. I am the former founder Borofy, a rental marketplace aggregator startup.

My Projects

  • Postmann Chrome Extension

    Perform API testing with Postmann, inspired by Postman. Handle GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE HTTP requests with precision.

  • Emoji Keyboard 1999 Chrome Extension

    Lets you [Insert] and [Copy] Emojis. It's Fast, Reliable, Open Source, and Free!

  • CatNote Chrome Extension

    A No-Login Feature-rich Notes App, powered by IndexedDB.

  • TubeIt Chrome Extension

    Instantly open YouTube using the current search term, tab title, or selected text with the right-click context menu / Alt+Y shortcut.

  • Launch your Website for free with GitHub Pages

    A course that breaks down each step to host your own website with GitHub Pages, which will be FREE forever.

  • Time Management & Productivity Deep Dive

    A course to help you build your own time management/productivity framework that works exclusively for you.

  • CV / Resume for Experienced & Freshers

    A course on how you can prepare a professional resume whether you are a fresher or an experienced candidate.

  • Happiness Secrets

    A Happiness Course, broken down into 7 simple steps, to help you achieve everlasting happiness and rapid growth.
